AboutText:
Cross platform (Web,IOS,Android) real time chess application 

WeChess是基于WEB的跨平台实时对弈程序. 提供了各种棋类游戏, 如围棋, 中国象棋, 国际象棋等打谱, 朋友间友好对弈, 人机对弈等功能.

WeChess与各社交平台如微信, 微博, facebook, twitter等直接关联, 可以自动登录并邀请好友随时对弈.

WeChess将带来一种全新的棋类游戏体验, 让我们随时随地享受对弈的乐趣.
MessageInvalidEmail: Please provide an valid email address.
MessageInvalidPassword: Password is too short, try again (at least 8 char)
MessageInvalidConfirmPassword: Password and confirm password must be teh same
PromptResetPassword: Please input your email address, we will send a password reset link to you.
MessageEmptyEmailOrPassword: Both email and password must not be empty!
MessageFillAllMandatoryFields: Please fill out all mandatory fields!
MessageResetPasswordEmailSent: Email sent, please check your mailbox.
MessageEmptyResetPasswordToken: Reset password token must not be empty!
MessageEmptyPasswordOrConfirm: Password or confirm password must not be empty!
MessagePasswordNotMatchConfirm: Password and confirm password are not the same!
MessageSomethingWrong: We are sorry but something went wrong.
PromptInvitationAction: You can copy the game link to clipboard, then paste it into any third party message apps, like short message, facebook. Or input your friend's email address at here then send email directly.
InvitationSubject: Your friend invite you to play game.
MessageVerificationSentSuccessfully: Email verification sent to your email address successfully.
MessageEmptyEmail: Game link must not be empty!
MessageEmptyInviter: Game inviter must not be empty!
MessageInvitationSentSuccessfully: Your game invitation sent to your friends successfully.
MessageInvitationAcceptedAlready: Invitation of this game had been accepted already.
MessageWaitingForFriendsAccept: You created this game and are waiting for friends to join.
MessageYourFriendInvitingYou: You friend is inviting you to join this game.
MessageWaitingForYouAccept: You friend created this game and login first to join.
MessageYouFriendAcceptedYourInvitation: You friend had accepted your invitation,
MessageYouAcceptedFriendInvitation: You had accepted your friends' invitation,
MessageWaitingForFriendPlayWhite: please waiting for friend to play first as white.
MessageWaitingForFriendPlayBlack: please waiting for friend to play first as black.
MessageFriendTurnToPlayWhite: your friend's turn to play white.
MessageFriendTurnToPlayBlack: your friend's turn to play black.
BP:closemsg: click anywhere to close this window
help_score: Click on stones to mark them dead or alive. You can also set and unset territory points by clicking on them. Territories must be completely bordered.
